Chat Session: Aaron Morris & Justin Grow Or Die Podcast
Text:
Justin, meet Steve Boerner, my best friend that I was talking to you about earlier today at codependent. I think this is an interesting conversation to explore leadership, entrepreneurship, AI, automation, efficiency, content creation, marketing funnels, and leadership.

Steve, meet Justin Mihaly, a friend in the moment of all of the stuff going on with me. Justin, amongst many many other talents, is a leader, coach, advocate, and business owner. Justin also runs the Grow or Die podcast. 

Let me know what else I can do to “make this happen.”
